ygData.subject: Re: GM Event on Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nothing, just participating in the event and the GMs picked out a few people who prominantly participated in the fun and rewarded them. I didn t get
ygData.messageBody:
> LOL! Sounds like fun. Sorry I missed that.
> What did you say to the faeries for them to give you
> gifts and stuff?

Nothing, just participating in the event and the GMs
picked out a few people who prominantly participated
in the fun and rewarded them. I didn't get anything
more than having levitate casted on me, but it's not
about the loot. It was a nice change of pace. :) If I
wanted loot, i'd have stuck to killing Centurions and
selling belts. :)
